title: Guidance for Parents: JB Peterson: From 12 Rules for Life
description:
Produced by Penguin Random House Canada re my new book 12 Rules for Life: An Antidote to Chaos: https://jordanbpeterson.com/12-rules-for-life/

Parents need to be courageous because they have to let their children go and make mistakes. You have to let your children fall when they're learning to walk. There's a certain amount of detached harshness that has to go along with your love and compassion. You have to stand back and let your child stumble forward to mastery.
